name: Introduction to React
description: Learn the fundamentals of React including components, props, state, and hooks.

name: Advanced JavaScript
description: Deep dive into ES6+, async programming, closures, and modern JavaScript patterns.

name: UI/UX Design Principles
description: Master the art of creating intuitive and beautiful user interfaces and experiences.

name: Node.js Backend Development
description: Build scalable server-side applications with Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

name: Python for Data Science
description: Learn Python programming with focus on data analysis, pandas, and visualization.

name: Mobile App Development with React Native
description: Create cross-platform mobile applications using React Native framework.

name: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Introduction to ML algorithms, supervised and unsupervised learning concepts.

name: CSS Grid and Flexbox Mastery
description: Master modern CSS layout techniques for responsive web design.

name: DevOps and CI/CD
description: Learn Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, and modern deployment pipelines.

name: Database Design and SQL
description: Comprehensive guide to relational databases, SQL queries, and optimization.
